title: Narcissism - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/30/20
itunes:title: Narcissism - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/30/20
description:
George Noory and psychology professor Dr. W. Keith Campbell explore his research into the phenomenon of narcissism, how it has increased in the era of social media, and how to spot symptoms of narcissistic behavior in yourself and others.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
